column4: hey my apt-get has been screwed up ever since feisty, whenever i try to apt-get install something or even try to run updates the connection gets refused
hey my apt-get has been screwed up ever since feisty, whenever i try to apt-get install something or even try to run updates the connection gets refused. what is wrong
hmm... perhaps your source list is messed up

you could try this... remove the sources.list file .. (sudo mv /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/backuplist.list) and then go into system menu, administration, software sources and click in the stuff you need, it shoudl create a new one for you
